post.text: This week in Cleveland, Republicans will nominate someone who thinks "Latino outreach" is tweeting out a picture of a taco bowl.

comment.author: Iisha
comment.text: Billary Hussain Obama is a candidate who thinks immigration is 50 Hispanics sneaking across the border without getting caught than being rewarded for there feat with free healthcare and food.

replies.author: Iisha
replies.text: Didn't you know Luca? He lived on the second floor.

replies.author: Kiersten
replies.text: NEVER HILLARY SHE'S CRIMINAL SHE'S STUPID SHE'S LIAIR SHE'S SICK

replies.author: Austin
replies.text: Never heard of Billary Hussain Obama. Can you enlighten us to he or she is?
